text:
The problem is caused by a known defect in the DocBook style sheets. You
have to upgrade to a more recent version of docbook-xsl.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
sorin@sync.ro
text:
I already did that. The PDF file can be generated with FOP 0.20.4 correctly both
with the latest DocBook XSL stylesheet (1.62.4) and with an older one (1.60.2).
FOP 0.20.5 generates no PDF with either of the DocBook XSL versions. The last
error message displayed in the output console is:

Flow 'xsl-region-body' does not map to the region-body in page-master 'blank'

The XML source is:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE book SYSTEM "../../docbook/dtd/docbookx.dtd">
<book>
    <article>
        <title>Welcome to the Docbook</title>
        <para>This is a sample showing that <oXygen/> can be used
            to edit documents in conformity with the dockbookx.dtd.</para>
    </article>
</book>

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
The error message is caused by a defect in docbook-xsl. AFAIK there
is a more recent release or at least development code which fixes this.
You may also patch the stylesheets yourself, the problem is the "blank-body".
Deleting the region name should be enough.
FOP 0.20.4 did not render certain blank pages, thereby missing the problem.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
